taxonomicnotes: There are no taxonomic discrepencies associated with this species.  Some consider it to belong to the genus Parambassis.
rationale: Pseudambassis baculis is a widespread species with no known major widespread threats, and is assessed as Least Concern. Populations have declined due to habitat loss, which needs to be monitored.
evaluator: Allen, D.J., Dey, S.C., Vishwanath, W., Jha, B.R. & Molur, S.
